metadata.title: CVE-2012-5598
metadata.description: ** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultIDs: CVE-2012-6060.  Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2012-6060.  Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2012-6060 instead of this candidate.  All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.
